verses.name: Psalms 148:8
verses.text: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapour; stormy wind fulfilling his word:

verses.name: Psalms 148:9
verses.text: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:

verses.name: Psalms 148:10
verses.text: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:

verses.name: Psalms 148:11
verses.text: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:

verses.name: Psalms 148:12
verses.text: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:

verses.name: Psalms 148:13
verses.text: Let them praise the name of the Lord: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
